thread.title: No place in Pakistan for terrorist organisations: Chaudhry Nisar
thread.title_full: No place in Pakistan for terrorist organisations: Chaudhry Nisar

title: No place in Pakistan for terrorist organisations: Chaudhry Nisar
text:
Nisar seeks Facebook, Twitter assistance in tackling blasphemous content 
ISLAMABAD: Interior Minister Chaudhry Nisar Ali Khan on Monday said that Pakistan does not have space for any terrorist organisation , adding that after Operation Zarb-e-Azb there is no headquarter of any militant organisation in the country. 
The Interior Minister was addressing the upper house of the parliament, where he said that there is a difference between terrorist and sectarian organisations. 
“We all have made Karachi’s situation better,” said Nisar, adding that few ‘new’ people are fond of point-scoring. 
He said that thousands of arrest also took place across the country, which led to improvement in the security situation overall. 0 0 No place in Pakistan for terrorist organisations: Chaudhry Nisar was posted in pakistan of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on March 20, 2017 and was last updated on March 20, 2017. This news story is related to Pakistan Latest News, Geo News Latest, Interior Minister Chaudhry Nisar Ali Khan, Islamabad, Senate, Parliament, Terrorist Organisations.
